summary: Five people, disillusioned with their lives and passionately opposed to politics, decide to kidnap a politician, to dispense justice and use the ransom money to compensate the family of a victim of an on-the-job worker.
cast: Pierfrancesco Favino|Daniele Ballicco|Fabio Volo|Giuseppe Battiston|Anna Bellato|Claudia Pandolfi|Nino Bernardini|Giorgio Tirabassi|Paolo Sassanelli|Teco Celio|Fausto Maria Sciarappa|Pietro Ragusa|Camilla Filippi|Lidia Biondi|Valentina Fois|Simona Nasi|Fabrizio Rondolino|Edoardo Gabbriellini|Antonello Piroso|Jacopo Bonvicini|Nicola Rondolino|Francesco Rossini|Teresa Acerbis|Chiara Tomarelli|Luca Moretti|Maria Luisa Vola
title: Figli delle stelle
